content: नाना {%<ab>ind.</ab>%} {@--1@} In different places, in different ways, manifoldly, variously. {@--2@} Distinctly, separately. {@--3@} Without (= विना); (with <ab>acc.</ab>, <ab>instr.</ab> or <ab>abl.</ab>); नाना नारीं निष्फला लोकयात्रा <ls>Vop.</ls>; (विश्वं) न नाना शंभुनां रामात् वर्षेणाधोक्षजोवंरः {%<ab>ibid.</ab>%} {@--4@} (Used as an adjective at the beginning of <ab>comp.</ab>) Manifold, various, sundry, different, diverse; नानाफलैः फलति कल्पलतेव भूमिः <ls>Bh. 2. 46</ls>; <ls>Bg. 1. 9</ls>, <ls>Ms. 9. 148.</ls>
